title: Lever
summaries: The Lever is a 2×2 activation mechanism purchased from the Mechanic for 30. It can activate Statues, lights, etc. via ⚷ Open / Activate.
The Lever can be placed on any flat surface, the same as <linked>furniture</linked>, including on <linked>platforms</linked>. It can also be placed on <linked>background walls</linked>.

Despite its depiction as a switch with two positions, the Lever does not need to act as an on/off mechanism. When wired to <linked>Dart Traps</linked>, for example, activating the Lever will always cause the trap to shoot, the same as a <linked>Pressure Plate</linked> would, no matter which position the Lever happens to be in.
